website_summaries.verdict: Glamping, here we come! Several reviewers say this is one of the best airbeds they've ever owned. More comfortable than some pricier brands.
pros: A great mattress that truly feels like a bed
Stands up to dogs and cats
Good to have around for company
Official airbed of the National Park Foundation.Antimicrobial sleep surfaceSwiftRise built-in 120V pump.Support lock reinforced construction for a more stable sleeping surface
Soft plush top creates a velvet-like sleep surface for more comfort
Removable, washable quilted top gives look and feel of a traditional bed
cons: Needs an electrical outlet – not a pump – to inflate, so make sure one will be available where you need it

customer_reviews.title: Luxury Camping
customer_reviews.text: Great sleeping in the woods! This thing barely lost any air over 7 days in the Rocky Mountains. The pump works great to inflate/deflate the mattress quickly, but it requires an actual power outlet, so make sure you have a power inverter handy, if you're out in the woods!
customer_reviews.author: Transmission3000

customer_reviews.title: Best air mattress I have ever owned. Feels like a real bed finally.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 4 other air mattresses in the past few years and also own the Select Comfort bed as a primary bed. This air mattress is great. It feels comfortable, well made and has kept almost all the air and maintained a constant firmness for 2 weeks now while I have been using. The 4 other beds I have owned are varied in price and quality, to include a top-end band (arguably the best) that I find not as comfortable as this one. I am 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deflates? Stretches?
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is awesome and very easy to use. My only problem with it is that it always deflates ... I get that it's stretching but I don't think it should be doing that every time I use it. It's extremely annoying when you've sunk into the mattress and feel like the walls are closing in around you. Maybe I have a defective one?
customer_reviews.author: RyannSays

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: We took this guy camping at a campground (with electricity to the site) in very cold weather. The attached pump is so convenient. It did lose some air due to the cold at night but it was never to the point where we sank too much or were uncomfortable. Any easy flip of the pump switch fixed it too. Really great and comfortable mattress. We love Coleman products.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Blew it up and didn't hold air at all. Defective valve. Bought two in advance for house guests and didn't blow it up for a month so past return date. The second holds air fairly, but they are not good quality. Very disappointed. Don't waste your money. Going to replace it with an Intex. Off-gas smell is intense.
customer_reviews.author: Dea Daniels

customer_reviews.title: What a great bed!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a temporary bed. It's strong. Dogs and cats walk on it all the time. Not had a puncture problem yet. Bed maintains its air without problem Good price, good product and it's comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: tristan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this air mattress. Super comfortable. Has not lost air. Pretty high off the ground. This one is even better than the Coleman I bought 5 years ago ( which I liked also). I did put a nice fluffy mattress pad on it and that makes it even nicer. Not cold at all. Very easy to inflate. Does not smell either. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kgilland

customer_reviews.title: Will Coleman step up and do the right thing?
customer_reviews.text: I used this air mattress one time and it was very comfortable. I had to inflate it every night, but it held well. The next time I used it, it did not hold air for more than 30 minutes. I missed the return date because I did not need the mattress for about 3 months. It is very upsetting. I paid 100 dollars for something I used one time. I thought Coleman products were much better than this. I just won't buy Coleman products from now on. I am disappointed because I thought Coleman products were better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Bellesbach

customer_reviews.title: really comfortable, blows up quickly and it the motor quickly ...
customer_reviews.text: Really, really comfortable, blows up quickly and it the motor quickly takes the air out. Easy to fold up and put back into storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: Ripped open during 4th use
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. The mattress suddenly ripped open along the seam during the 4th night it was used. Other customers seemed to have reported a similar issue. What is the process to request for a refund under the guarantee? Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Air it out for a long time before using
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and put them away for guests. Today, I opened and inflated one. I had to leave the room because the smell of vinyl was really really strong.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality bed.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed! This is the second one I’ve purchased because it is easy to use for guests, comfortable, and holds up well (first one is three years old and gets moderate use throughout the year). Worth the price. I will buy another if I get more guests at one time and need to expand the sleeping needs.
customer_reviews.author: Samual Andrews

customer_reviews.title: ... buy this last minute for some guests - very comfortable and easy to inflate and deflate
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy this last minute for some guests - very comfortable and easy to inflate and deflate. Definitely five stars.
customer_reviews.author: delfosse

customer_reviews.title: Great air mattress
customer_reviews.text: Recently moved to a new place and bought this to sleep on until I could buy an actual mattress. Most comfortable air mattress I've ever slept on. Inflates and deflates very fast and doesn't require constant reinflation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - very comfortable for my guests
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use - very comfortable for my guests. Highly recommend this mattress for having a spare bed around when lots of folks drop by for holidays or other gathering. Can also bring it with you as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: So far great..
customer_reviews.text: So far great...have inflated for 1 week..had to put in a little air over the week. Have company coming so will find out how comfort level is. Feels comfortable when I lay in it.
customer_reviews.author: Medicsr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific value -- very comfortable and high off the floor. Easy to set up and stayed inflated. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Go Go

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: I didnt even have it a week and it wouldn't maintain any air. I will not be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: MY brother slept on it for 4 months with no problem.. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J Albertson

customer_reviews.title: Inflates Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Inflation worked perfectly. Good rest. I like that it will reinflate quickly, if needed. I use it for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Gi Yundt

customer_reviews.title: Great air mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great product, used it immediately for family members who said it was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable (when deflated) and compact (when deflated)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mattress. Durable and comfortable. Folds up relatively small. Inflates relatively fast. And the relatives are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Guests said it was comfortable, can't put sheets on it
customer_reviews.text: Guests said it was comfortable, can't put sheets on it, but figured it out. Very easy to put up, love that part, haven't tried to put it back in the bag yet, all in all, good buy
customer_reviews.author: Maggie C

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and very comfortable would recommend this to anyone who wants a spare ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and very comfortable would recommend this to anyone who wants a spare bed. When its packed away it doesn't take up much space and it comes with its own bag for storage
customer_reviews.author: sheila Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't that great!! They were happy
customer_reviews.text: We had the grand kids for Thanksgiving. It didn't loose air at all for a week. Wasn't that great!! They were happy, so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Virgil R. Du Pont Jr.

customer_reviews.title: WOW! One of the best things I have ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Air mattress! This is the first time I bought one and slept on it and it was more conferrable then my bed at home. I would recommend the queen size with the built in pump. 100%
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase,  no problems!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, inflated quickly, dog and cat walk on it with no problem, 7 year old jumps on it and my middle schooler slept on it for 2weeks while her bedroom was being worked on.... it never lost air. Great purchase. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Printz

customer_reviews.title: Easy and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and break down. Uber comfy! Slept on the twin size for a month. Recently bught queen size for guests.
customer_reviews.author: M McCamey

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, easy to assemble, and easy to pack. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Item does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. Valve inflates but won’t close when switch to off. Total waste of money. Now on my way to wal mart so I can buy something to sleep on. Totally useless purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This only lasted for two days
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! I used this air mattress (at home!) for two uses and it's already losing a lot of air. :(
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J Standifer

customer_reviews.title: Stays inflated.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for company. Does not loose air. Had it inflated for two weeks, with one person sleeping on it for a week. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: andy eveler

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great value, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: A great air mattress. Inflates quickly, a real help when we had family over the holidays! Stores away easily, very compact. Not extremely heavy. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for guests when needed. It inflates very fast and is a very sturdy bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: bed is very comfortable, does need a mattress cover which I will ...
customer_reviews.text: bed is very comfortable, does need a mattress cover which I will purchase in the future. No air leakage. We used It over the holidays and our guests had no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: helena s.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great nights sleep. Not so happy with trying to place it back in the bag after usage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: First time use , my guest woke up on the floor. Found 2 pin holes on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Very poor product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like it at all, it deflated too quick. Doesn’t last one night with 120 pound person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything it said it was.
customer_reviews.text: It is great, went up really fast and wasn’t too bad to sleep on! Got one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Camping=Glamping!!
customer_reviews.text: For a air mattress...the easiest one I have ever used. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and this one was terrible in comparison
customer_reviews.text: Did not hold air even after a few hours with no weight on it. I had a similar model previously, and this one was terrible in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Roland

customer_reviews.title: Need air daily
customer_reviews.text: Loses air daily--followed all instructions....when inflated, it is great. I could understand inflating weekly but daily is a bit much!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but was damaged and unusable
customer_reviews.text: Could have been the best air mattress better but had a hole in the seam and immediately started leaking air.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 4-3-2018. Delivered 4-5-2018. Returned window closed 5-5-2018 ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4-3-2018. Delivered 4-5-2018. Returned window closed 5-5-2018. Side split and pump leaked from pump 5-12-2018. Product deposited in trash on the morning of 5-13-2018. Waiting on city trash removal service to haul it off on 5-15-2018.
customer_reviews.author: rebel2308

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it worked out perfect for our needs! Would recommend it to all
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Eidsvoog

product_meta.title: Coleman Air Mattress with Built-in Pump | SupportRest Elite Double-High Inflatable Air Bed, Queen
product_meta.description: When guests arrive, offer them the all-night comfort of a Coleman Support Rest elite elevated airbed. The velvet-like plush top creates a soft feel to help them drift off to sleep in comfort. It comes with the convenience of a built-in 120V pump, so you'll always be ready to inflate your bed. Once you find the perfect firmness, the airtight system will help keep it there, since it's factory-tested to be leak-free. With the Comfort Strong coil system and support lock reinforced construction working together to provide lasting support, your guests might never want to leave.
feature_bullets: Support lock reinforced construction lets you enjoy a more stable sleeping surface
Built-in 120V pump ensures you're always ready to inflate your bed
Soft plush top creates a velvet-like sleep surface for more comfort

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
